name: MILITARY-INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX
description:
THE STORY SO FAR:

The MILITARY-INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX prologue story is on the official site: http://mic-game.com

CONTROLS:

During introduction or ending:
ESC or SPACE to skip

During gameplay:
Press LEFT or RIGHT on your keyboard to drive The Economy
SPACE to dismiss World Events

Any time:
M to mute the audio

If MILITARY-INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX is not responding to any keyboard controls you may have to click once inside the game window.

FREE VERSION:

MILITARY-INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX is also available to play for free in your browser here: http://gamejolt.com/games/military-industrial-complex/123918
